item.description: Hi everyone. This is very last minute, but I'm hosting a sort of housewarming backyard party this evening starting after 5pm. It is supposed to be windy so not sure if a firepit will be successful. I hosted two other bonfire parties since joining this meetup and met numerous great people through them. Unfortunately haven't had time to make it a formal one through the website until now. So this is more of a casual welcome wagon to fellow newcomers. If you are interested in stopping by in a non-bar environment, please send me a text at 401.345.0325 for directions. I live near Providence College on the west, northwest side of town. The gathering is outside to enjoy the weather, but note that I do have pets if you are allergic (they'll be hiding or kept in a room). BYOB, BYO-Chair, Blankets, etc. I'll have some hot apple cider and a little bit of turkey chili. If you are on your way out on the town or to OCCUPY Providence, stop by after 5/5:30! - val
item.name: Welcome Wagon
